## What's Here?

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
Files <- dir()
Files
library(DT)
Files.df <- data.frame(Files=Files) %>% mutate(link=paste0(paste0('<a href=',paste0("\"https://robertwwalker.github.io/CMF-Slides/",Files,"\"", sep=""),' > ', sep=""),Files,'</a>',sep=""))
datatable(Files.df, escape = FALSE)
```
